review:
** ******** ** ********** *** ** *** **** ******* ******* * **** ***** His demeanour and bed-side manner is calm, positive, thorough, attentive, flexible, and personal. I saw him last week for ankle ligament injury. Dr Merchant made me feel comfortable and relaxed and asked me about my ankle injury and he made recommendations as to what I need ** ** ********* ************* *** dedicated. Honestly, what a wonderful thing to have a doctor who actually cares about my well-being, and takes the time to explain his thinking.
I would definitely consult Dr. Merchant again if I have future ortho needs.

It's been  8yrs now knowing him as a doctor as a wellwisher 
Always there for u in any emergencies many doctors r treating u on  facetime,  coz of this pandemic but Dr Zahir is always available throughout this year for any circumstance Ty God Bless u Good luck

Dr Zahir merchant is very friendly and methodical in his approach ,the diagnosis and treatment was satisfactory,listens and understands ur problem's very patiently .Would definitely recommend for people who are looking for quality medical services.**               **** ** *** **** ****** ** ******

Excellent Sessions for the orthopadic Treatment
Good Advised, Experienced Dr zahir.
I was treated with spine disorder & right leg operation as i was injured during football match
Was well operated by him & Now everything is normal as nothing happened . Thankyou Dr.Zahir Good 1 Highly Recommended

Very cooperative , just looking at the hand the Dr informed me it seems like ligaments strain. Unlike other Dr I was not asked to go for lenghty process of x-ray and other check ups. 
Treatment suggested to keep.the hand strap for one week and hot water fermentation was very useful.

Much recommended

** ** ******** ******* *** very professional, kind, attentive *** ********* ************* ******* Listened patiently and carefully explained condition and treatment and later the problem was quickly diagnosed and got really fast and awesome results.
Doctor Zahir is such a gentle and nice person. And of course he does a good job and is very professional.
Very understanding and makes his patients feel very comfortable and explains the treatment very well.

Extremely patient friendly. Quick diagnosis and prompt treatment.

Thankyou!

Dr. Zahir is very confident *** ************* He takes his time during consultation and checks up on the patient to see if the treatment is working. He is generally alert and goes out of his way for the comfort and well being of his patients. I had a most satisfactory experience with his practice.
Every time I have come to Dr Zahir ** *** ********* ***** *** *** ********** *** **** ********* ********* *** **** ********* Highly recommend him. Doctors like him is what our country needs.
************* *** credible spine and orthopaedic specialist in their field. I would highly recommend Dr. Zahir, his approach is friendly and methods trust worthy.
